panels.title: Per-step Throughput
panels.description: Step executions per second per step (from tpf.step.duration count).

panels.title: Per-step Latency (avg)
panels.description: Average per-step execution latency derived from tpf.step.duration histogram.

panels.title: Per-step Service Time
panels.description: Average server-side processing time per RPC service.

targets.expr: label_replace((sum by (tpf_step_class, tpf_item_type) (rate(tpf_item_produced_items_total{tpf_step_parent=~".*\\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__rate_interval])) or sum by (tpf_step_class, tpf_item_type) (rate(tpf_item_produced_total{tpf_step_parent=~".*\\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__rate_interval]))), "step", "$1", "tpf_step_class", ".*[.]([^.]*)$")

label_replace((sum by (tpf_step_class, tpf_item_type) (rate(tpf_item_consumed_items_total{tpf_step_parent=~".*\\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__rate_interval])) or sum by (tpf_step_class, tpf_item_type) (rate(tpf_item_consumed_total{tpf_step_parent=~".*\\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__rate_interval]))), "step", "$1", "tpf_step_class", ".*[.]([^.]*)$")

panels.title: Domain Item Throughput
panels.description: Items per second at the configured item boundary (producer vs consumer). It will ONLY display data if a boundary step is selected (see pipeline.telemetry.item-input-type and pipeline.telemetry.item-output-type).

panels.title: Per-step In-flight Items
panels.description: Peak in-flight items observed per step.

panels.title: Step Buffer Utilization
panels.description: Percentage of queued buffer step items to configured capacity per step.

panels.title: Per-step Buffer Depth (items)
panels.description: Peak number of queued items sitting in the backpressure buffer per step.

panels.title: Step Buffer Depth vs Capacity
panels.description: Queued buffer step items vs configured capacity per step.

panels.title: Step In-flight vs Max Concurrency
panels.description: Peak in-flight step items per step vs configured max concurrency.

targets.expr: label_replace(100 * (sum by (rpc_service) (rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_good_total{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]) or rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_good{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]))) / sum by (rpc_service) (rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_total_total{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]) or rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_total{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval])), "step", "$1", "rpc_service", "(.*)")

label_replace(100 * (sum by (rpc_service) (rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_latency_good_total{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]) or rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_latency_good{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]))) / sum by (rpc_service) (rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_latency_total_total{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]) or rate(tpf_slo_rpc_server_latency_total{rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval])), "step", "$1", "rpc_service", "(.*)")

panels.title: RPC Latency SLO (server)
panels.description: SLO latency compliance per RPC service.

targets.expr: label_replace(100 * (sum by (rpc_service) (rate(tpf_slo_rpc_client_good_total{service_name="orchestrator-svc",rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]) or rate(tpf_slo_rpc_client_good{service_name="orchestrator-svc",rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]))) / sum by (rpc_service) (rate(tpf_slo_rpc_client_total_total{service_name="orchestrator-svc",rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval]) or rate(tpf_slo_rpc_client_total{service_name="orchestrator-svc",rpc_service=~"Process${step}Service|.*(Observe|Persistence|Cache|Metrics|Trace).*Service"}[$__rate_interval])), "step", "$1", "rpc_service", "(.*)")

panels.title: Orchestrator RPC Availability (client)
panels.description: SLO availability for orchestrator downstream RPC calls.

targets.expr: label_replace(100 * (sum by (tpf_step_class) (increase(tpf_slo_item_throughput_good_total{tpf_step_parent=~".*\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__range]) or increase(tpf_slo_item_throughput_good{tpf_step_parent=~".*\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__range]))) / sum by (tpf_step_class) (increase(tpf_slo_item_throughput_total_total{tpf_step_parent=~".*\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__range]) or increase(tpf_slo_item_throughput_total{tpf_step_parent=~".*\.Process${step}GrpcClientStep"}[$__range])), "step", "$1", "tpf_step_class", ".*[.]([^.]*)$")

panels.title: Item Throughput SLO
panels.description: Share of runs meeting the configured throughput threshold.
